trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event occurs when a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> is added or removed from a managed collection of such lists.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>이벤트가 발생할 때 한 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>이 추가 되거나 이러한 목록은 관리 되는 컬렉션에서 제거 합니다.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised when an individual list element changes its value.
trans-unit.target: 개별 목록 요소 값을 변경 하는 경우에이 이벤트가 발생 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event is generated by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> class when its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> methods are executed.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.

For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the `relatedObject` parameter will always reference the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>이벤트는 `relatedObject` 매개 변수는 항상 참조는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>하는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>관련 된.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object that is associated with the collection.
A value that specifies whether a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> has been added or removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 값 여부는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> 추가 또는 컬렉션에서 제거 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: The collection of list elements after the action has been applied.
trans-unit.target: 작업이 적용 된 후에 목록 요소 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> 이 이벤트와 연결 된 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The retrieved <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> represents the state of the collection after the event, which involved adding or removing an element, has been applied.
trans-unit.target: 검색 된 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>추가 또는 제거와 관련 되는 이벤트 적용 된 후 컬렉션의 상태를 나타냅니다.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> that represents the current state of the collection.
Gets a flag indicating whether an element has been added or removed from the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 요소가 추가 되거나 컬렉션에서 제거 되었는지 여부를 나타내는 플래그를 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Altering the contents of an existing <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> in the collection will not raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 기존 내용을 변경 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>컬렉션에 발생 하지 것입니다는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>이벤트.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType"></xref> that indicates the type of change.
Gets the object that that is associated with the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 연결 하는 개체를 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The RelatedObject property enables the programmer to associate an object to an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: RelatedObject 속성은 개체 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>클래스</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> 의 인스턴스를 연결 하는 프로그래머의 사용

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the RelatedObject property should always reference the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>이벤트 RelatedObject 속성 항상 참조 해야는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName>하는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>관련 된.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>
